title: Can someone explain
body:
How i manage to have better queue times at 3am at night then 6pm during the evening for ranked?

Legitimately confused as to why ranked was ever disabled when this is the case.

replies.body:
quality over quantity.

i cant stand the late night/early morning crowd

I can't stand anyone i get matched with, and i can ignore the chinese shit in chat more then i can ignore some of the shit i get during the day.

For example this vayne build

PD > IE > GA > Armor boots > Jaurim's Fist

This is the problem with gold and below, they believe Vayne is able to be built this way, and don't understand the basics of vayne.

If your going to build extreme defense like this, either max your AS or max your AD, don't dabble in both.

I rather not wait 10 minutes for a shit game, may as well get the shit straight away.
fair enough, i recently just played with a {{champion:67}} who built {{item:3094}} first  then blamed me for us losing lane
